title: NBA mobility, Kawhi Leonard, USWNT, and Ben Simmons
itunes:title: NBA mobility, Kawhi Leonard, USWNT, and Ben Simmons
description:
Colin talks about how the NBA doesn't get the credit it deserves for its mobility, more on where Kawhi Leonard might go, and how he feels about Ben Simmons new contract with the 76ers. Colin also defends the USWNT while saying people are overreacting. Guests include Nick Wright, Chris Broussard Rob Parker, and Jared Dudley.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
